fields_of_interest: Culture, Education and training, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Public Health
inter_groups: Intergroup on the Rights of the Child in the European Parliament
eu_initiatives:
The work of DG EAC, EMPL and JUST 
The Intergroup on Child Rights at the European Parliament
organisation_name: Alliance for Childhood European Network Foundation (Alliance for Childho)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: The Alliance for Childhood is a member of Eurochild and of the European Policy Centre.
goals__remit:
- To increase the respect for childhood as a 
basis for human development and to create 
awareness of the needs of all children. 
• To develop and inspire ideas for solutions to 
those problems which could endanger the 
good quality of childhood. 
• To provide a platform for contacts, 
inspiration, exchange, peer learning, 
encouragement and dialogue among policy 
makers, decision makers, researchers, 
practitioners, parents and all people that 
have an influence on children’s lives.
relevant_communication: We organise 4 sessions per year in the European Parliament with MEPs as host on the subject of improving the quality of childhood in Europe and we publish once in 2 year a book in the series 'Improving the Quality of Childhood in Europe'. So far 6 volumes were published.
